version_description:
Bug fix for iPad Air and iPhone 5S. 
The app doesn’t crash anymore after selecting a number or letter.

We made the app future-proof: 
- A fresh new icon
- App is iOS 8 ready now 
- iPhone 6 & iPhone 6 Plus are supported now

We've added cursive letters and essential shapes for preschool as well!

Bugfixes:
- Fixed: Audio wasn't working for some users
- Fixed: For newer devices, switching to a different font caused problems
- Fixed: Easy now to restore previous purchases. 
- Fixed: Cursive letter 'L' crashed 

Do you have more comments / bugs? Please let us know at LetterSchool.com

In this new update, we fixed some small bugs!  Do you have more comments / bugs? Please let us know at LetterSchool.com

We improved the performance of the app by fixing several small bugs. 

Do you have more comments / bugs? Please let us know at LetterSchool.com

- Small performance improvements & fixes.
- New, updated high-quality icon.
- Refreshed brand = refreshed intro animation.
- Added a link to our other amazing apps!
- We always work on improvements, for any feedback please let us know on: www.letterschool.com

- Performance improvements & bug fixes.
- New, updated game selection screen makes it easier to navigate between different categories.
- We've added a new category: "Learn to Spell" with 150+ words to sound out in English!
- The biggest update yet!
We always work on improvements, for any feedback please let us know on: www.letterschool.org
If you experience any issues or need help with restoring your previous purchase please contact us ASAP at support@letterschool.org

Thanks for using LetterSchool! This update includes:
- The option to download and switch between 12 different languages!
- A menu that allows you to change your “learning language” and your “menu text” while playing.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

As always, if you have any comments or run into any issues, let us know at support@letterschool.org.
And don't forget to check our FAQ at www.letterschool.com
